attributes.action: Gyms should be classed as essential for the mental wealth of the nation
attributes.additional_details: Exercise is important for our mental health and general health which has been pushed to the extremes throughout this pandemic.
attributes.background: Allow gyms to stay open regardless of the tier the area is in for individual exercise. Open gym along with essential shops in tier 4 areas.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Prevent gyms closing due to a spike in Covid 19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/333869

Keep gyms open during Tier 4 lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/563904
